item.description: Post Effects # Special Keys Key Description 1 Black and white 2 Blur 3 Hight contrast 4 Sepia Effect 5 Viggneta Effect Post-effect refers to any modifications or enhancements applied to an image after it has been captured or rendered. These effects are typically applied using image editing software or tools. Post-effects can be used to alter the overall appearance of an image, enhance certain aspects, or create specific artistic or stylistic effects.

Procedural texturing # Procedural texturing is a technique used in computer graphics to generate textures algorithmically, rather than relying on traditional image-based textures. It involves creating textures using mathematical functions, patterns, or algorithms to define the visual appearance of a surface. as we can see at The book of shaders we can create patterns and visualized it in a surface we find that truchet shader created by patriciogv could be use for map a sphere all credits to the author
